DOC.brief_summary: Hypothesis : Electrical stimulation abdominal vagus nerve anti-inflammatory effect represent new therapeutic approach shorten postoperative ileus . Aims : In present pilot study , investigator want evaluate anti-inflammatory effect peroperative electrical stimulation vagus nerve . To end , follow aim formulate : 1. optimize technique intra-operative electrical vagus nerve stimulation 2. show electrical stimulation intra-abdominal vagus nerve reduces inflammatory response abdominal surgery 3. evaluate whether electrical stimulation vagus nerve lead clinical improvement ( collect pilot data )
DOC.brief_title: Pilot Study : Anti-inflammatory Effect Peroperative Stimulation Vagus Nerve
DOC.criteria: Patients rectal carcinoma eligible open rectal resection Age 18 70 year Preoperative therapeutic abdominal radiation Evident intraabdominal inflammation ( diagnosed imaging and/or laboratory test result , include abscess cholecystitis ) American Society Anesthesiologists physicalhealth status classification ( ASAPS ) > 3 Poorly regulate diabetes ( > 200 mg/dl ( =11mmol/l ) )
